text: Valentina Truppa (born 18 March 1986 in Milan) is an Italian Olympic dressage rider. She was in two Olympic Games. She was in the 2012 and 2016 Summer Olympics. Her best Olympic score was in 2012. Valentina was also at the 2014 FEI World Equestrian Games and at three European Dressage Championships. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1986 births Category:Competitors at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Italian equestrians Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Milan Category:Olympic equestrians for Italy Category:Italian dressage riders
title: Valentina Truppa
